artist: Etcher: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully; Designer: Jacques Francois Joseph Saly
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
description: full-length profile of a woman with very long arms, tottering on high-heeled shoes; woman wears earrings and a headscarf and carries a basket filled with twisted cloth
portfolio: From "Recuëil de Caricatures Dessinées par J. Saly et Gravées par A.L. De Lalive D.J.," no. 12
title: Rita Pontani, Laundress at the French Academy in Rome (?), no. 12, from "Recuëil de Caricatures"
